httpStatus.title: The HttpStatus Schema
httpStatus.description: This field specifies the Http Code for error.

errorCode.title: The ErrorCode Schema
errorCode.description: This field specifies the pre defined Error Code for Mule Error.

timestamp.title: The TimeStamp Schema
timestamp.description: This field specifies the timeStamp when the error occurred.

errorMessage.title: The Errormessage Schema
errorMessage.description: This field gives the description of the error occurred.
